description.text: Newton Per Coulomb ( N/C) is a unit in the category of Electric field strength. It is also known as newtons/coulomb. Newton Per Coulomb ( N/C) has a dimension of MLT-3I-1 where $M$ is mass, $L$ is length, $T$ is time, and $I$ is electric current. It essentially the same as the corresponding standard SI unit V/m.
